titleStmt.title: A true widow a comedy acted by the Duke's servants / written by Tho. Shadwell.
titleStmt.author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

notesStmt.note: The prologue is by Dryden. After his quarrel with Shadwell he gave this prologue to Mrs. Aphra Behn for her play The Widow Ranter.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
